name: A Tiny Light In The Dark
name_original: A Tiny Light In The Dark
description:
Lucy, a small 5 year old girl, is woken up by the sound of thunder in the middle of the night. Noticing that her friend, Teddy, is missing, she decides to brave the darkness to retrieve him.

A Tiny Light in the Dark is a puzzle game where you have to turn on all of the lights in a room in order to proceed to the next one, and eventually reach your parents' bedroom.

This game was made in two days as part of the Global Game Jam, but has received several fixes since its initial version.
